author: Alexander Panetta
title: Pandemic, an economic meltdown, now a 3rd crisis: China-U.S. tensions
description: The world's two biggest powers are growing increasingly hostile and it's worsened with COVID-19. The rivalry could intensify this year, with the U.S. public angry and the president bashing China as an election strategy.
content:
First came the deadly pandemic, then the economic meltdown, and now a third international crisis looms. It's geopolitical, involving escalating tensions between the world's existing and emerging superpowers: the United States and China.
This week's feud abou… [+8854 chars]
